rfamily_seq module¶

rfamily_seq.rfamily_seq(families, form='fasta', download=False, path=None)¶

This function search for sequences of the family in format and form specified by the user.

Parameters

  • families (str or list) – accession of the family, or list of the families accession

  • form (str, optional) – Output format of ssequences. Available: fasta, stockholm, defaults to fasta

  • download (bool optional) – ‘True’ if download to the file, defaults to False

  • path (str, optional) – path to the outpur file if download is True

Returns

List of SeqIO type objects

Return type

list
